ABOUT

Hacktoberfest is DigitalOcean's annual event that encourages people to contribute to open source throughout October. Much of modern tech infrastructure including some of DigitalOcean's own products relies on open-source projects

Projects

Hactobot

An open source discord bot to access your github repositories.
